title: Google Drive says its been uploading 5 files for hours. Rebooting didn't help. What do I do?
content: Pixel notification bar shows google drive has been uploading 5 files for hours. I've rebooted the phone. When google drive is opened the "upload" starts again. Next, I opened app manager. Stopped google drive, cleared cache. When drive is restarted the "upload" starts again. What else can I do?
